name: Menlo Park Library Wi-Fi Hotspots
description: Free 7-day checkout of portable Wi-Fi hotspots for library cardholders
fullDescription: The Menlo Park Library offers portable WiFi hotspot devices that library cardholders can borrow, providing free internet access at home or on the go.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free 7-day checkout of portable WiFi hotspot
- High-speed internet access anywhere
- No data limits during checkout period
- Available to all library cardholders
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Menlo Park Library card (free for residents)
2. Check availability of hotspots online or at the library
3. Place a hold or visit the library to check out
4. Return within 7 days to avoid late fees
keywords: Menlo Park Library, WiFi hotspot, portable internet, free internet, library card, borrow hotspot, mobile WiFi, internet access
